title: WTB: Raw Singles or Large Lot
author: bundy462

posts.post_title: WTB: Raw Singles or Large Lot
posts.post_content: Looking to pick up singles all the way to a large lot of raw low condition cards. I'd like to be at no more than $15 a card for commons as a reference point but also looking for HOFers, SLers, Demmit, and O'Hara. Let me know what you have!
Picked up a few, any more out there? Raw rare backs welcome also.
